mapper.update: merge into hsp_xtzl_inf a using (select #{emgNo, jdbcType = VARCHAR} emg_no, #{proCode, jdbcType = VARCHAR} pro_code, #{proVal, jdbcType = VARCHAR} pro_val from dual) b on (a.emg_no = b.emg_no and a.pro_code = b.pro_code) when matched then update set a.pro_val = b.pro_val, a.mod_user = #{modUser, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, a.mod_time = sysdate when not matched then insert (SEQ_NO, EMG_NO, PRO_CODE, PRO_VAL, CRT_TIME, CRT_USER, MOD_TIME, MOD_USER) values (HSPXTZLINF_SEQ.nextval, b.emg_no, b.pro_code, b.pro_val, sysdate, #{crtUser, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, sysdate, #{crtUser, jdbcType = VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select a.pro_name, a.pro_type, a.pro_code, b.pro_val, a.pro_list, a.pro_unit from (select pro_name, pro_type, pro_code, pro_list, pro_unit from hsp_xtzl_def where node_id = #{nodeId, jdbcType = VARCHAR} order by fld_sort) a, (select pro_code, pro_val from hsp_xtzl_inf where emg_no = #{emgSeq, jdbcType = VARCHAR}) b where a.pro_code = b.pro_code

select a.seq_no, a.emg_no, a.pro_code, a.pro_val, a.crt_time, a.crt_user, a.mod_time, a.mod_user from hsp_xtzl_inf a where emg_no = #{emgSeq, jdbcType = VARCHAR} and pro_code in
#{item}

select inf.seq_no, inf.emg_no, inf.pro_code, inf.pro_val, def.pro_type, def.pro_name, def.key_time from hsp_xtzl_inf inf, hsp_xtzl_def def where inf.pro_code = def.pro_code and inf.emg_no = #{emgSeq, jdbcType = VARCHAR} and def.pro_type = 'datetime' and inf.pro_val is not null and def.key_time in ('1', '2') order by inf.pro_val asc, def.fld_sort asc

sql.if: and a.cst_nam like '%'||#{cstNam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
and a.emg_dat < #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
and a.emg_dat >= #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
and exists (select * from hsp_xtzl_inf where hsp_xtzl_inf.emg_no = a.emg_seq and hsp_xtzl_inf.pro_code = 'DYFS' and hsp_xtzl_inf.pro_val = #{dyfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
and exists (select * from hsp_xtzl_inf where hsp_xtzl_inf.emg_no = a.emg_seq and hsp_xtzl_inf.pro_code = 'CBZD' and hsp_xtzl_inf.pro_val = #{cbzd,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
and exists (select * from hsp_xtzl_inf where hsp_xtzl_inf.emg_no = a.emg_seq and hsp_xtzl_inf.pro_code = 'CCDW' and hsp_xtzl_inf.pro_val = #{ccdw,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
and exists (select * from hsp_xtzl_inf where hsp_xtzl_inf.emg_no = a.emg_seq and hsp_xtzl_inf.pro_code = 'YQRSZL' and hsp_xtzl_inf.pro_val = #{yqrszl,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
and exists (select * from hsp_xtzl_inf where hsp_xtzl_inf.emg_no = a.emg_seq and hsp_xtzl_inf.pro_code = 'YQRSCS' and hsp_xtzl_inf.pro_val = #{yqrscs,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
and b.cst_Nam like '%'||#{cstNam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
and b.crt_tim < #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
and b.crt_tim >= #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
and exists (select * from hsp_xtzl_inf where hsp_xtzl_inf.emg_no = b.xt_seq and hsp_xtzl_inf.pro_code = 'DYFS' and hsp_xtzl_inf.pro_val = #{dyfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
and exists (select * from hsp_xtzl_inf where hsp_xtzl_inf.emg_no = b.xt_seq and hsp_xtzl_inf.pro_code = 'CBZD' and hsp_xtzl_inf.pro_val = #{cbzd,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
and exists (select * from hsp_xtzl_inf where hsp_xtzl_inf.emg_no = b.xt_seq and hsp_xtzl_inf.pro_code = 'CCDW' and hsp_xtzl_inf.pro_val = #{ccdw,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
and exists (select * from hsp_xtzl_inf where hsp_xtzl_inf.emg_no = b.xt_seq and hsp_xtzl_inf.pro_code = 'YQRSZL' and hsp_xtzl_inf.pro_val = #{yqrszl,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
and exists (select * from hsp_xtzl_inf where hsp_xtzl_inf.emg_no = b.xt_seq and hsp_xtzl_inf.pro_code = 'YQRSCS' and hsp_xtzl_inf.pro_val = #{yqrscs,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
and a.cst_nam like '%'||#{cstNam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
and a.crt_tim < #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
and a.crt_tim >= #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
and exists (select * from hsp_xtzl_inf where hsp_xtzl_inf.emg_no = a.emg_seq and hsp_xtzl_inf.pro_code = 'DYFS' and hsp_xtzl_inf.pro_val = #{dyfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
and exists (select * from hsp_xtzl_inf where hsp_xtzl_inf.emg_no = a.emg_seq and hsp_xtzl_inf.pro_code = 'CBZD' and hsp_xtzl_inf.pro_val = #{cbzd,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
and exists (select * from hsp_xtzl_inf where hsp_xtzl_inf.emg_no = a.emg_seq and hsp_xtzl_inf.pro_code = 'CCDW' and hsp_xtzl_inf.pro_val = #{ccdw,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
and exists (select * from hsp_xtzl_inf where hsp_xtzl_inf.emg_no = a.emg_seq and hsp_xtzl_inf.pro_code = 'YQRSCS' and hsp_xtzl_inf.pro_val = #{yqrscs,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.select: select count(1) from hsp_dbzl_bas a where a.PAT_TYP = '1' and a.hsp_ara =#{hspAra,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select a.reg_seq regSeq, a.emg_seq emgSeq, a.vst_cad vstCad, a.id_nbr idNbr, a.cst_nam cstNam, a.cst_sex_cod cstSexCod, (case when a.cst_age_cod = '0' then a.cst_age else '0' end) cstAge, (select pro_val from hsp_xtzl_inf where hsp_xtzl_inf.pro_code = 'SCYLJCSJ' and hsp_xtzl_inf.emg_no = emg_seq) scyljcsj, (select pro_val from hsp_xtzl_inf where hsp_xtzl_inf.pro_code = 'FBSJ' and hsp_xtzl_inf.emg_no = emg_seq) fbsj, (select pro_val from hsp_xtzl_inf where hsp_xtzl_inf.pro_code = 'CBZD' and hsp_xtzl_inf.emg_no = emg_seq) cbzd, a.way_typ wayTyp, a.crt_tim crtTim, a.smt_seq smtSeq, a.smt_sta smtSta from hsp_dbzl_bas a where a.PAT_TYP = '1' and a.hsp_ara =#{hspAra,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select CEIL((min(dstgsj) + 0 - (select to_date(pro_val, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') from hsp_xtzl_inf where pro_code = 'DDYYDMSJ' and emg_no = #{emgSeq,jdbcType=VARCHAR})) * 24 * 60) from hsp_crivel_inf where emg_seq = #{emgSeq,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by emg_seq
select xt_seq, vst_cad, cst_nam, cst_sex_cod, id_nbr, cst_age, bth_dat, phe_nbr from hsp_xt_add where xt_seq = #{emgSeq, jdbcType = VARCHAR}

select a.seq_no, a.emg_no, a.pro_code, a.pro_val, b.pro_type, b.pro_name, b.pro_unit, b.pro_list, b.pro_memo, b.fld_desc from hsp_xtzl_inf a, hsp_xtzl_def b where a.pro_code = b.pro_code and a.emg_no = #{emgSeq, jdbcType = VARCHAR} and a.pro_val is not null
